title: 110_hr3385
content: National Homelessness Task Force Act of 2007 - Establishes in the legislative branch a National Homelessness Task Force to: (1) analyze reports by federal, state, and local agencies and academic institutions relating to homelessness. (2) evaluate the effectiveness of federal programs addressing homelessness, particularly their interaction with state and local entities which also address homelessness. (3) analyze options and make recommendations to alleviate the causes and effects of such homelessness. And (4) conduct related research and develop methods to improve, federal, state, and local agency coordination.
